documents.document:
bleh

Sometimes doing nothing is the worst thing for you, but that doesnt make doing something you dont wanna do any easier, you spend your life looking for something, and then when you find it you are so afraid to lose it that you forget to open your eyes and do what is best... what is right

Some people may believe that if you love something you let it go.... and if it comes back it was meant to be... if it doesnt then it was never really love at all....

i think thats a load of horse shit....

If you love something dont let it go... hold on for dear life and work your arse off to get by... if that fails... then the only adivce that you will ever need.... is that if you love someone, you have to do whatever you can in your power to make them have a happier life... with you.... or without you

i think i may have rambled enough now, but it helped...

to all of you out there that have been hurt by hanging on... dont remember the pain that was caused... remember the happiness you had.... because a second of happiness forgotten is one you will never get back..

hold on to those seconds and eventually you will get your happily ever after.

never alone

i dont know if what i did was right...
you didnt seem to mind...
i'd take it back in a second if i knew that things would be ok...
i never wanted to let go so i'm never going to...
all it takes is a call... a message... a letter in the mail...

i dunno... in my mind the only thing that matters your happiness

i...

just dont know

mmhmm

It wont be long, we'll meet again,
Your memory is never passing
It wont be long we'll meet again,
My love for you is everlasting.....

. . .

Well then... to beign this blogging session...

*bangs head on desk*

now that this is out of the way...

I'm confused as hell...

Trying to work through everything in my head...

I have a big choice to make in about a month....

Whether to Pack up and move away from everything I have grown to Love and to Hate, the place that I have made my life, and just move and start fresh... with the chance that when i get back... none of it will be here...

Or whether to stay in hopes that one day soon I will have back everything I loved, family, friends, love itself.... i've never been one for change.... in fact i made a huge change not long ago and i hated doing it... and i hate the after effect.... but for some reason i felt it had to be done

I hate making decisions... especially ones that I know I might regret....

If only I had something to help me make decisions.... some sort of sign saying.... go there.... or please dont leave...

Its all too much sometimes..

game, set, match

well,

apparently being a sooky, messy ex-boyfriend doesnt always lead to the one you love hating you completely..

guess now all I have to do is wait til you get to the top of that disabled ramp,

I was driving last night and saw this disabled ramp to a building, guess what I saw at the top...

It was an elevator, maybe when we meet at the top of the disabled ramp we can catch the elevator together?

Thank you for last night, it meant a lot that you still have time for me

ummm i dunno

this blog isnt about anything in particular..

guess i just hope everything is going well and that you are enjoying your tassle!!

i think i need some sleep... i am going to Jen's house tonight to bring her cake... should be good... she's 18 now :-D

oh well thats all...

Hopefully talk soon??

haha

Thinking of dying my beard a wacky colour, but I have been told I should run everything past you before the formal so what is your opinion dear partner of mine??

You get first dibs on colour

On top of that I am thinking a plain Tux shall be worn- Black Tails, Black Vest, Black Pants, Black Tie and some odd coloured shirt (or just a white one)... with Black Chucks (not torn ones brand new ones or shoes whichever you prefer

Opinions needed m'lady, when you get back from the movies, oh and be sure to let me know how it was

xxx

slight realisation

i've been a bit pushy..

sorry its not intentional, thank you for the letter thingy you wrote me... i'd love you to be here for me and i will always be there for you with that smile to make it that little bit easier...

you can act however you like around me... you know i'm not gonna be weird about it... just yeah be yourself i'd prefer it that way

I had such an awesoem time with you on Friday night!!!! and i'm glad you had a fun time too I was smiley more than you saw, i saw how much fun you were having and that was the important part to me..

Everything you are trying to change... please DONT... it's what makes you who you are...

anyways.... bordering on pushy again so yeah thats all i got..

love love

Out the way... not out of love

Well its bout time I made a move that isnt going to put pressure on you because i know that's all i seem to be doing lately...

All i know is this is sorta tearing me apart, not knowing where to go... not knowing where we are... never knowing whether the first girl i ever loved still loves me... lol it sounds so stupid yet its all i'm thinking about...

To avoid being pushy I'm sorta taking a step back coz the one thing i know i was never able to give you no matter how hard i tried.. was space...

I just hope that in the end you might come looking for me... coz you've said it before and i'm gonna say it now coz i hope you meant it
"i hope ur still there at the end
because i always want you beside me"

Ups and Downs i'm still here for you, i always will be... only a call/msg away... i promise

Love Always,


Sheepy
a.k.a
The Pancake Guy
a.k.a
Caillin

Funny But True

1. At the end of every party there is always a fat girl crying.
2. One of the most awkward things that can happen in a pub is when your pint to toilet cycle get synchronized with a complete stranger.
3. You're never quite sure whether it's ok to eat green chips.
4. Everyone who grew up in the 80's has entered the digits 55378008 into a calculator.
5. Reading when you're drunk is horrible.
6. Sharpening a pencil with a knife makes you feel really manly.
7. You're never quite sure whether it's against the law or not to have a fire in your back garden.
8. Whatever your age the desire to make plastic dolls shag is almost impossible to resist.
9. Nobody ever dares make cup a soup in a bowl.
10. You never know where to look when eating an apple.
11. It's impossible to describe the smell of a wet cat.
12. Prodding a fire with a stick makes you feel manly.
13. Rummaging in an overgrown garden will always turn up a bouncy ball.
14. You always feel a bit scared when stroking horses.
15. Everyone always remembers the day a dog ran into their school.
16. The most embarrassing thing you can do as a schoolchild is to call your teacher mum or dad.
17. The smaller the monkey, the more it looks like it would kill you at the first given opportunity.
18. Some days you see lots of people on crutches.
19. Old women with mobile phones look wrong!
20. It's impossible to look cool whilst picking up a frisbee.
21. Driving through a tunnel makes you feel excited.
22. You never ever run out of salt.
23. Old ladies can eat more than you think.
24. You can't respect a man who carries a dog.
25. There's no panic like the panic you momentarily feel when you've got your hand or head stuck in something.
26. No one knows the origins of their metal coat hangers.
27. Despite constant warning you have never met anybody who has had their arm broken by a swan.
28. The most painful household incident is wearing socks and stepping on an upturned plug.
29. People who don't drive slam car doors too hard.
30. You've turned into your dad the day you put aside a thin piece of wood specifically to stir paint with.
31. Everyone had an uncle who tried to steal their nose.
32. Bricks are horrible to carry.
33. In every plate of chips there is a bad chip.
34. Triangle sandwiches taste better than square ones.
35. Beneath every floating balloon is a tearful child.

hmmm

Well i'm sorta new to this whole thing, so for all you people out there that wanna talk to a strange kinda guy with a wicked sense of humour, thats probably not me but I'm willing to substitute!

And for anyone that knows me or doesn't know me, feel free to add me and say howdy..

that is all.
